LITB077.title: Found Money
LITB077.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 077 Found Money.mp4
LITB077.description: Beaver isn't worried that he doesn't have any money to spend at the carnival after his best friend Larry Mondello promises to pay the way. But conniving Larry has spent all of his allowance too and, sneaking money from his mother's sewing basket, throws it out the window and arranges to have Beaver "find" it.

LITB078.title: Most Interesting Character
LITB078.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 078 Most Interesting Character.mp4
LITB078.description: Beaver has to write a school paper about the most interesting character he has ever met. He decides to make it about Ward, but has a hard time deciding what to write.

LDCB1943.path: ../1940's Classics/Life and Death of Colonel Blimp, The (1943).mp4
LDCB1943.title: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp

LITB079.title: Blind Date Committee
LITB079.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 079 Blind Date Committee.m4v
LITB079.description: Wally is chairman of the Blind Date Committee for a dance and has to find dates for people. One girl is especially hard to find a date for.

SOKO16.title: Torozon: An Enemy Robot
SOKO16.description: Beginning with the Swiss Branchg, the Unicorn branch headquarters are mysteriously destroyed one after another. Rome, Cairo, Bombay, Singapore, Hong Kong, then Tapai. It is easy to guess that Tokyo will be next.

ULTR31.title: Who Goes There?
ULTR31.description: A Science Patrol member from South America who was born in Japan makes a return visit. Bringing with him a sample of a man-eating plant.

SPRA32.title: Gang of Assassins (part 1)
SPRA32.description: While sightseeing in Japan, the Mach 5 team crosses paths with a gang of assassins who are out to sabotage an international peace conference.

TGBU1966.path: ../Westerns/Good, the Bad and the Ugly, The (1966).m4v
TGBU1966.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

LITB080.title: Beaver Takes a Bath
LITB080.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 080 Beaver Takes a Bath.m4v
LITB080.description: When the babysitter cancels at the last minute, Ward and June leave Wally in charge while they are out of town overnight. They have a bathroom mishap in the new house when Beaver takes a bath.

DRHI16.title: Philadelphia
DRHI16.description: Baron von Steuben helps train the Continental Army, John Adams and Thomas Jefferson campaign against each other for president, and Benedict Arnold betrays George Washington's army.

POIR04.title: Poirot - 04 Four and Twenty Blackbirds
POIR04.description: When a reclusive painter is found dead, Poirot finds the vital clue in the dead man's last meal.

CSMS06.title: Travellers' Tales
CSMS06.description: Carl Sagan looks at the planets Jupiter and Saturn by examining the work of Galileo, Huygens, and the Voyager probes.

FREK1932.title: Freaks
FREK1932.description: Set amongst the backdrop of a travelling French circus and follows a conniving trapeze artist who joins a group of carnival sideshow performers with a plan to seduce and murder a dwarf in the troupe to gain his inheritance.

LITB076.title: Beaver the Athlete
LITB076.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 076 Beaver the Athlete.mp4
LITB076.description: Beaver gets bad grades in physical education when he clowns around to make up for his lack of coordination.

SPRA31.title: The Man on the Lam
SPRA31.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 31 The Man On The Lam.mp4
SPRA31.description: Speed is taken hostage by Lawson Lamster, an escaped convict searching for the money he stole before being captured. Unfortunately, Lamster's partners are right on his tail.

ULTR32.title: Endless Counterattack
ULTR32.description: A member of the Science Patrol is on vacation from India. Her vacation is cut short when a monster begins burning mountains and surrounding areas.

STAN16.title: The Jihad
STAN16.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 16 The Jihad.m4v
STAN16.description: A team comprising various experts (Kirk and Spock among them) must recover an artifact known as the Soul of the Skorr. The theft must be kept secret or a galactic holy war could break out.
